name: Purple Trainwreck
description: Purple Trainwreck by Humboldt Seed Organization is an indica-dominant strain that combines genetics from Trainwreck and Mendocino Purps. Blooming in hues of bright green and magenta, Purple Trainwreck is as colorful as it is flavorful. Exhibiting a rich aroma of bright citrus, pine, and lavender, this indica appeases the consumer chasing a stimulating cerebral experience anchored in full physical relaxation. Its breeders recommend growing this strain in a warm, dry climate or indoors with sufficient space and nutrients.
descriptionPlain: Purple Trainwreck by Humboldt Seed Organization is an indica-dominant strain that combines genetics from Trainwreck and Mendocino Purps. Blooming in hues of bright green and magenta, Purple Trainwreck is as colorful as it is flavorful. Exhibiting a rich aroma of bright citrus, pine, and lavender, this indica appeases the consumer chasing a stimulating cerebral experience anchored in full physical relaxation. Its breeders recommend growing this strain in a warm, dry climate or indoors with sufficient space and nutrients.
aka: Purple Wreck, Purple Reck, Granddaddy Wreck, Granddaddy Trainwreck, Granddaddy Train Wreck

highlightedReviews.text:
Dude, if you plan on seeing your girl in the near future start away from this because no matter how sexy she is you gonna make an excuse to stay home and not give a fuck.

Also I learned how to make the greatest pillow fort in all the land. No girls allowed, just me and my dog Jack (to be fair he came up with the password so I had to let him in).

best strain iâ€™ve smoked so far. the high i have on it is the high i feel like i should have every time i smoke weed. i feel so relaxed and happy. it makes me feel like iâ€™m dream. And the high lasted for SOOO long, knocked my ass clean out. I slept for 3 hours. ðŸ¤¯

articles.title: Leafly's Faves 2017: Strains
articles.author: Leafly Staff
articles.text:
Leaflyâ€™s Faves is a series providing a glimpse into the strains, products, and brands that our team of cannabis aficionados is buying, consuming, and enjoying the most every year. Some are entirely new to the market, while others are simply perennial favorites that we canâ€™t recommend enough. Below, find our crewâ€™s favorite cannabis strains of 2017. How many have you tried? What was your favorite strain of 2017? Share with us in the comments below!

Plushberry
An introspective indica that wonâ€™t put you to sleep, Plushberry is the perfect strain for enjoying some peace and quiet. Relax with the aroma of lavender wrapped up in this cross of two more of our faves: Space Queen and Black Cherry Soda.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
11 Unsung Cannabis Strains Worth Discovering

Lemonder
For a light, euphoric strain that offers bright flavors of lemon and pine, track down the balanced Seattle-native hybrid Lemonder. A cross between Lavender, Super Lemon Haze, and OG Kush, we love its mentally stimulating qualities that donâ€™t overwhelm.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
What Are You Smoking? Episode 18
The Top THC-Dominant Strains of Washington State in Fall 2017

Allen Wrench
A child of popular parents (Trainwreck and NYC Diesel), the sour sativa Allen Wrench packs a punch of upbeat energy. We love harnessing its powerful cerebral qualities and energy-boosting characteristics on busy days.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
6 Cannabis Strains to Help You Stay Productive
These Cannabis Strains All Have Unique Cannabinoids


Dutchberry
Ringing in at around 8% CBD and 27% THC, the giggle-inducing hybrid Dutchberry takes on the best attributes of its Dutch Treat and DJ Short Blueberry parents. A particularly delicious strain, we canâ€™t get enough of the berry and citrus flavors that accompany this happy high.
Also featured in: Smoke This, Play That Vol. 4
Sunset Sherbet
The potent hybrid Sunset Sherbet is a powerful, full-body strain that will take you to new heights with its cerebral stimulation. Weâ€™ve been filling our bongs with a hefty dose to melt away stress and bask in a richly euphoric high.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
The 10 Cannabis Strains You Must Try This Summer
Top Trending Strains of 2015
Tips for Growing Sunset Sherbet Cannabis

Dark Side of the Moon
Inspired by the famous Pink Floyd album, Dark Side of The Moon is a sweet indica that we like to reserve for right before bedtime. For the perfect nightcap after a stressful day, we recommend packing your favorite pipe and slipping into an elevated slumber.
Also featured in: May the Fourth Be With You: The Best Strains to Celebrate the Galactic Star Wars Holiday

Space Queen
With sweet dessert aromas including notes of vanilla, cherry, and apple, the hybrid Space Queen helped us stay upbeat in 2017. Perfect for daytime use, Space Queenâ€™s sativa qualities deliver a buzzy kick that will keep you going (despite its indica Romulan roots).
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
Celebrate 10 Famous 4/20 Birthdays With These Strain Pairings
Which Cannabis Strain Pairs Best With your Zodiac Sign?
7 â€˜Eye Candyâ€™ Movies to Pair With Your Favorite Strain

White Tahoe Cookies
The strong indica that is White Tahoe Cookies was practically made for lazy days. With sedative effects that build with each hit, youâ€™ll want to park somewhere comfortable and clear your schedule for a cozy day in (weâ€™ve found White Tahoe Cookies to be very hyggelig).
Harlequin
The CBD-rich sativa Harlequin delivers a stress-melting 5:2 CBD:THC ratio that expertly crushes anxiety and pain without the intoxicating effects. A Columbia Gold and Swiss landrace descendant, Harlequin is a preferred strain for those among us who are medical patients as well as the many of us who simply love CBD.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
Tips for Growing Harlequin Cannabis
7 High-Energy Strains to Help You Get Active and Fight Fatigue
High CBD Products for Medical Marijuana Patients
What Are the Best Cannabis Stains for Pain?


Dancehall
Suitable for social gatherings and celebratory occasions, the hybrid Dancehall is an aptly named energy-boosting strain. Weâ€™ve been loading up our vaporizers before concerts, parties, festivals, and all manner of exciting events.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
11 Unsung Cannabis Strains Worth Discovering

Purple Trainwreck
Born from the powerhouse combination of Trainwreck and Mendocino Purps, hybrid Purple Trainwreck is the go-to strain for laughing fits and cerebral stimulation. Weâ€™ve been keeping it on hand for its tasty notes of pine, lavender, and citrus.
Also featured in:

Tips for Growing Purple Trainwreck Cannabis
10 Products to Pick Up Before 4/20
The 10 Cannabis Strains You Must Try This Summer

Lead image by Julia Sumpter/Leafly

articles.title: Tips for Growing Purple Trainwreck Cannabis
articles.author: Leafly Staff
articles.text:
Ever wanted to grow your favorite strain? Leafly and BotanicareÂ are teaming up on a series of grow guides that will equip you with all the tips and tricks you need to grow different strains successfully.

Strain Overview: Purple Trainwreck is a cross between Mendocino Purps and Trainwreck. Both parent strains are well-known in the California scene, and Purple Trainwreck follows in their footsteps. Known for its large yields and resistance to disease and mold, this strain has been a longtime favorite for outdoor cultivators.
Grow Techniques: Grow this strain outdoors if you can. Healthy soils and exposure to sunlight will allow this strain to grow large. Top once when the plant is a few feet tall and again every few weeks until it reaches flowering; this will allow the plant to grow into an even bush of buds. If youÂ prune and stake the branches, you will be well rewarded.
Flowering Time: 8 to 9 weeks
Yield: High
Grow Difficulty: ModerateÂ 
Climate: Purple Trainwreck resists mold well and tolerates colder temperatures. While harsh weather can lower the yield, this plant can push through some tough times. Ideally, Purple Trainwreck should be grown between 65 and 80 degrees Fahrenheit.
Indoor/Outdoor: If you have the option, grow this strain outdoors where it has enough space to take off.
Feeding: Healthy soil at the beginning of the season will get Purple Trainwreck started on the right foot. Compost tea can improve the plantâ€™s vitality, and top dressing the soil with phosphorus-dense nutrients at the beginning of flowering will keep Purple Trainwreck growing at full speed.

Its breeders recommend growing this strain in a warm, dry climate or indoors with sufficient space and nutrients.
